name: Chyrkyan Trial II. PROTOCOLLO: INVASIONE (MAC)
description:
Massimiliano Ciullo, Sebastiano Ciullo - CIULLO CORPORATION

Chyrkyan Trial II. PROTOCOL: INVASION - MAC Edition (OPEN ALPHA Demo "5th Anniversary")

:::: Upcoming sequel to Chyrkyan Trial I this is yet but a prototype, but you can already play both against AI or one friend: again as a Chyrkyan but this time challenge your similar into a "relaxed" harvest of new batch of companions for your clan ::::

ALPHA Release Features:

Basic
9,90$ Silver
 19,90$ Gold 
24,90$ Platinum 
29,90$ MAC Game files + Manual + Front Covers DVD Cover + Label (MAC) + Soundtrack + Artbooks fullHD Trailer + Cinematics Shortmovie WINDOWS & LINUX Game files
  • Pre-rendered fullHD Hi-Rez 3D CG in-game assets for better performance
  • 1 game mode
  • Singleplayer
  • Multiplayer (Hotseat x2)
  • Multiple endings
  • Soundtrack

Download DEMO to check System Requirements and view the Manual for more info (this game can be played ONLINE by PATRONs, videos are also available on STREAMING)
